intro_section_title: Discover our collection of Discord bots!
intro_section_description: Discord bots enhance your server with automated features. From moderation to music, games, and community tools, our bots will significantly improve your server's experience. These example bots are limited to 100 commands per day to allow you to test their features before developing your own solutions.
call_to_action_description: After exploring our example bots (limited to 100 daily commands), join our developer community to learn how to create your own unlimited Discord bots. We'll guide you step by step in designing solutions perfectly tailored to your server.
error_message: Unable to load Discord bot information. Please try again later.
